Welcome to Turing Route 66’s documentation!¶

Documentation for the assignment ‘Touring Machines’ for the course Simulation Tooling for the bachelor programme Artificial Intelligence at the HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht.

  • Package: route_66
    • Module: route_66.agent
    • Module: route_66.batch_run
    • Module: route_66.model
    • Module: route_66.server
    • Module: route_66.visualisation

To run the simulation in the interactive webserver, the file run.py needs to be executed. This will open the webpage http://127.0.0.1:8521/

The plots belonging to the simulation and the batch run can be seen in the Jupyter Notebook Simulation Analysis.ipynb.

To update the documentation, the command make html needs to be run.

Python 3.8.X is currently not supported. It is recommended to run the simulation in Python 3.6.x or 3.7.x.
